member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO
member.summary: Used by UpdateLayeredWindowIndirect to provide position, size, shape, content, and translucency information for a layered window.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: A handle to a DC for the screen. This handle is obtained by specifying NULL in this member when calling UpdateLayeredWindowIndirect. The handle is used for palette color matching when the window contents are updated. If hdcDst is NULL, the default palette is used.
If hdcSrc is NULL, hdcDst must be NULL.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.pptDst
member.summary: The new screen position of the layered window. If the new position is unchanged from the current position, pptDst can be NULL.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.psize
member.summary: The new size of the layered window. If the size of the window will not change, this parameter can be NULL. If hdcSrc is NULL, psize must be NULL.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.hdcSrc
member.summary: A handle to the DC for the surface that defines the layered window. This handle can be obtained by calling the function. If the shape and visual context of the window will not change, hdcSrc can be NULL.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.pptSrc
member.summary: The location of the layer in the device context. If hdcSrc is NULL, pptSrc should be NULL.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.crKey
member.summary: The color key to be used when composing the layered window. To generate a COLORREF, use the macro.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.pblend
member.summary: The transparency value to be used when composing the layered window.

summary.para: This parameter can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Use pblend as the blend function. If the display mode is 256 colors or less, the effect of this value is the same as the effect of ULW_OPAQUE.
Use crKey as the transparency color.
Force the UpdateLayeredWindowIndirect function to fail if the current window size does not match the size specified in the psize.

summary.para: If hdcSrc is NULL, dwFlags should be zero.

member.name: UPDATELAYEREDWINDOWINFO.prcDirty
member.summary: The area to be updated. This parameter can be NULL. If it is non-NULL, only the area in this rectangle is updated from the source DC.
